PSCT.Base: You can Tribute all face-up "Division(s)" you control; Special Summon up to twice that many "Machine Tokens" (Machine/FIRE/Level 1/ATK 200/DEF 200), and each time 1 is destroyed, your opponent takes 500 damage. If this card is banished: You can target any number of Tokens you control; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Division" once per turn.
